subject: ControlUp alert mail - Machine Down -  Machine DEROT04430.bitzer.biz is down (ControlUp Agent unreachable.)
body:
This is an automated alert from ControlUp, which you requested to receive using an incident trigger. 

	
One of your managed computers has disconnected from monitoring.


     Organization name: Bitzer


     Trigger name: CITRIX Machines: Computer Down ROT_TS ROT <controlup://incidents/CITRIX Machines: Computer Down ROT_TS ROT> 


     Computer name: DEROT04430 <controlup://incidents/DEROT04430> 


     Disconnect reason: ControlUp Agent unreachable.


     Incident timestamp (UTC +2 W. Europe Standard Time): 8/26/2025 3:42:33 PM



In order to configure which e-mail alerts you receive, please open ControlUp and edit the settings for the trigger specified above.
trigger_name: CITRIX Machines: Computer Down ROT_TS ROT
